overview: Meet Kipper, a loveable dog with a big imagination! Today's the day to join Kipper, Tiger, Jake, Pig and Arnold in their wonderful world of magic and fun. Every day is playtime with Kipper and his friends. While playing with Arnold, Kipper discovers that baby-sitting his little pig friend can be exhausting! Does Arnold ever get tired of playing? In another episode, Tiger thinks it's funny to play tricks on his friends. But once they discover the greatest treasure: a caring friend. It's all in a day's play in these delightful stories from Kipper!
title: Kipper: Playtime
